languages.text: "Я... полагаю, Эмелина предпочла запечатать блок, в котором хранит данные личного характера. Она поступает так, когда опасается, что кто-то может выведать у нее подробности про отряд Калькасара..." {n}Хейнрикс на мгновение задумывается, а затем отчетливо произносит:{/n} "Сигма Благоденствие". {n}Дознаватель делает паузу. Затем повторяет странные слова снова.{/n}

"I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я... полагаю, Эмелина предпочла запечатать блок, в котором хранит данные личного характера. Она поступает так, когда опасается, что кто-то может выведать у нее подробности про отряд Калькасара..." {n}Хейнрикс на мгновение задумывается, а затем отчетливо произносит:{/n} "Сигма Благоденствие". {n}Дознаватель делает паузу. Затем повторяет странные слова снова.{/n}

She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我……认为是艾米莉娜封印了含有个人数据的记忆区块。每当她担心有人从她这里套取卡尔卡扎小圈子的情报时，她就会这么做……”{n}海因里希思考片刻，之后以清晰的声音说道。{/n}“西格玛昌盛。”{n}他顿了顿，之后重复了一遍这个古怪的词语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……认为是艾米莉娜封印了含有个人数据的记忆区块。每当她担心有人从她这里套取卡尔卡扎小圈子的情报时，她就会这么做……”{n}海因里希思考片刻，之后以清晰的声音说道。{/n}“神王西格玛。”{n}他顿了顿，之后重复了一遍这个古怪的词语。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Supongo... que Emelina habrá decidido sellar el bloque de memoria que contiene la información personal. Lo hace siempre que cree que alguien puede intentar extraer la información que posee sobre la camarilla de Calcazar...». {n}Heinrix piensa durante un momento y después dice:{/n} «Sigma Prosperidad». {n}Hace una pausa antes de repetir esas curiosas palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Supongo... que Emelina habrá decidido sellar el bloque de memoria que contiene la información personal. Lo hace siempre que cree que alguien puede intentar extraer la información que posee sobre la camarilla de Calcazar...». {n}Heinrix piensa durante un momento y después dice:{/n} «Sigma Prosperidad». {n}Hace una pausa antes de repetir esas curiosas palabras.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は...エメリナさんが個人的な性質のデータを含むメモリーブロックを封印することを選択したと予想しています。彼女は誰かがカルカサルの一団に関する情報を自分から引き出そうとしているのではないかと不安を持つたび、いつもこれをやるんです…」{n}ハインリックスは少し考えてから、はっきりとした声で一言告げる。{/n}「シグマの繁栄」{n}彼は奇妙なフレーズを繰り返す前に言葉を止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は...エメリナさんが個人的な性質のデータを含むメモリーブロックを封印することを選択したと予想しています。彼女は誰かがカルカサルの一団に関する情報を自分から引き出そうとしているのではないかと不安を持つたび、いつもこれをやるんです…」{n}ハインリックスは少し考えてから、はっきりとした声で一言告げる。{/n}「シグマの繁栄」{n}彼は奇妙なフレーズを繰り返す前に言葉を止めた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je... pense qu'Emelina a choisi de sceller le bloc mémoriel contenant des données de nature privée. C'est ce qu'elle fait lorsqu'elle craint que l'on essaie de lui soutirer des informations concernant l'entourage de Calcazar... » {n}Heinrix prend un moment pour réfléchir, puis déclare d'une voix limpide :{/n} « Prospérité à Sigma. » {n}Il marque une pause avant de répéter ces mots étranges.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... pense qu'Emelina a choisi de sceller le bloc mémoriel contenant des données de nature privée. C'est ce qu'elle fait lorsqu'elle craint que l'on essaie de lui soutirer des informations concernant l'entourage de Calcazar... » {n}Heinrix prend un moment pour réfléchir, puis déclare d'une voix limpide :{/n} « Prospérité à Sigma. » {n}Il marque une pause avant de répéter ces mots étranges.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... nehme an, dass Emelina den Gedächtnisblock mit persönlichen Daten versiegelt hat. Das macht sie immer, wenn sie besorgt ist, jemand könnte Informationen über Calcazars Koterie aus ihr herausholen ..." {n}Heinrix denkt einen Augenblick lang nach und sagt dann klar und deutlich:{/n} "Sigma Prosperität." {n}Nach einer Pause wiederholt er die seltsame Phrase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... nehme an, dass Emelina den Gedächtnisblock mit persönlichen Daten versiegelt hat. Das macht sie immer, wenn sie besorgt ist, jemand könnte Informationen über Calcazars Koterie aus ihr herausholen ..." {n}Heinrix denkt einen Augenblick lang nach und sagt dann klar und deutlich:{/n} "Sigma Prosperität." {n}Nach einer Pause wiederholt er die seltsame Phrase.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sanıyorum... Emelina, şahsi bir tabiata sahip veriler içeren hafıza blokunu kapalı tutmayı seçmiş. Birinin Calcazar'ın heyetiyle ilgili ondan bilgi çalmasından endişe ettiğinde yapar bunu." {n}Heinrix, kısa bir süre düşünüp ardından net bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Sigma Refah." {n}Duraksıyor ve tuhaf tabiri tekrar ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... expect that Emelina has chosen to seal the memory block containing data of a personal nature. She does this whenever she is concerned that someone might try to extract information about Calcazar's coterie from her..." {n}Heinrix thinks for a moment, and then in a clear voice says,{/n} "Sigma Prosperity." {n}He pauses before repeating the strange phrase.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım... Emelina şahsi bir tabiata sahip veriler içeren bir hafıza blokunu kapalı tutmayı seçmiş. Birinin Calcazar'ın heyetiyle ilgili ondan bilgi çalmasından endişe ettiğinde yapar bunu." {n}Heinrix kısa bir süre düşünüyor, ardından net bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Sigma Refah." {n}Duraksıyor ve tuhaf tabiri tekrar ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
